name: Stunted Hearts
description:
Stunted Hearts is my Final Graduation Project for the Higher Certificate in Game Design course at the Academy of Digital Arts.

Stunted Hearts is a quirky dark-comedy anti-dating simulator, where you as a player are tasked with breaking up with souls to get them to cross over to the other side. The game takes place in a purgatory where the player meets manifestations of the Player Character’s previous failed relationships.

Gameplay goes between a choice-based dialogue system, and physics-based mini-games.

Assets used listed in the Credits inside the game. All unlisted assets were made by myself.

CONTROLS:

  • Use the mouse to choose dialogue options
  • In the minigame, use the mouse to block projectiles
